titles.title: He's Got Fire In His Eyes

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's got fire in His eyes
And a sword in His hand
And He's riding a white horse
All across this land (2x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And He's calling out to you and me:
Will you ride with me?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And we say yes Lord,
We will ride with You.
We will stand up and fight
We will ride the armies of heaven

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
And we say yes, yes Lord.
We will ride.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
That fire in His eyes.
It's His love for His bride.
